attributes.action: FOUR YEARS TOO HARSH for 'facebook riot post pair'
attributes.additional_details: as the BBC have reported. two men aged 21 and 22 have been sentenced to 4 YEARS in prison. there are annual riots in Northern Ireland and no such sentence would ever be seen for something like this. clearly an over-reaction and may incite more violence or perhaps worse; turn hacker groups against government and civilian departments as they have been doing all over the world for things they see as injustices.
